name: Ferris Wheel Fix-Up
objective: Use JavaScript to restart the Ferris Wheel at FunLand and rescue the stranded visitors!

hints.1: You can use the JS Console gadget to run JavaScript functions. Try typing `help()` to get a clue.
hints.2: The `startFerrisWheel()` function should do the trick. Try entering this into the JS Console.

success: Well done, Agent! The Ferris Wheel is moving again, and the trapped visitors are now safe!
